DOC.brief_summary: The Wellness Incentives Navigation ( WIN ) project design help improve health self-management reduce incidence consequence chronic disease among non-elderly adult Medicaid Supplemental Security Income ( SSI ) beneficiary . WIN target SSI beneficiary behavioral health ( mental health substance abuse ) diagnose . Research demonstrate individual likely suffer chronic physical co-morbidities , experience debilitate chronic illness earlier life elevate healthcare cost . WIN use person-centered wellness planning navigation facilitate trained , professional health Navigators , dedicate specifically WIN project , use Motivational Interviewing ( MI ) technique , personal wellness account . Participants serious mental illness offer additional support form Wellness Recovery Action Planning ( WRAP ) enable take full advantage person-centered wellness planning .
DOC.brief_title: Evaluation Texas Wellness Incentives Navigation ( WIN ) Project
DOC.detailed_description: The Texas base Wellness Incentives Navigation ( WIN ) project use continuum evidence-based `` whole person '' intervention take account clinical , environmental , social risk factor co-morbidities . Unlike traditional didactic approach health management , WIN address individual behavioral , social , economic barrier health wellness , promote continued engagement achieving , internalize , maintain healthy behavior . The study focus non-dual eligible adult STAR+PLUS ( Texas Medicaid manage care program people chronic illness ) member ( age 21-55 ) behavioral health disorder include serious mental illness ( SMI - e.g. , schizophrenia , bipolar disorder major depressive disorder ) behavioral health condition ( e.g. , anxiety disorder substance abuse ) . Key feature program include use professional health navigator , work collaboration three STAR+PLUS plan Harris Service Area ( SA ) ( United-Evercare , Amerigroup , Molina ) , use motivational interviewing ( MI ) techniques help member develop meet personal wellness goal , flexible wellness account participant use meeting his/her goal .
DOC.criteria: Be resident Harris service area Be nondual eligible member STAR+PLUS ; Be 21 55 year age ; Have SMI Diagnosis ( schizophrenia , bipolar disorder , major depressive disorder ) ; Other behavioral health diagnosis ( e.g. , anxiety , depression , substance use disorder ) couple chronic health diagnosis ( physical health condition ) . Intellectual cognitive diagnosis indicative severe cognitive impairment . These could include diagnosis 290.X ( dementia ) 318319 ( moderate severe mental retardation ) .
